channel.title: Sirus-Scape 667! Everyone join today! ~All Skills~ ~GE~ ~Need staff~
channel.description:
[center][font=times new roman][size=36pt]Sirus-Scape 667 ~!Join today!~[/size][/font][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Features~~ - 24/7 - No lag - Stable Economy - 100% Uptime - Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic - 138 combat, summoning counts - Constant Updates - Professional and active Staff - Active Clean Forums - Old Runescape Armor - DonatorZone (with shops) - Loyalty point system with shop (500 points every 30mins) - Various shops. - Dominion Tower - Lava Flow Mining - Jadinko Lair - Frost Dragons - Bork - Tormented Demons - New Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin) - Squeal of fortune. is soon to be added! - Bone's on altar. - Hunter. - All the GodWars Dungeons. - Fully working Nex. - Curses, ancients etc. - Working Revenants. - Queen Black Dragon - Fight Caves - Custom Dung! - Working chaotics - Working Flowers and Dicing - Money pouch - Working clan wars! - Great staff and a fast growing community! - fully working slayer and slayer tower! - Auto-Voting - Auto-Donate - Great PvP and switching - Owner takes all ideas into consideration. - Perfect switching - unique home - & all the usual Matrix stuff![/size][/center]
[center][font=verdana][size=18pt]Links :) - Client http://up.ht/18fC1jF [/size][/font][/center] [center][font=verdana][size=18pt]- Website [url=http://sirus-scape.webs.com]sirus-scape.webs.com[/url][/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=impact][size=24pt]~Media~[/size][/font][/center]
[center]Like I said all the basic matrix stuff and way more to be added weekly Join today![/center] [center]http://gyazo.com/7e12db4b422406f819a40f99e4efef4f[/center] [center]http://gyazo.com/714dfdf3c5e5fb81b40401626db77e1a[/center] [center]http://gyazo.com/710d9204694982bef8743d4f4c619d02[/center] [center]http://gyazo.com/120ea39685d41cdc196609b31287ea40[/center] [center]http://gyazo.com/3c57993e3afe5f3d7245e06c6d844705[/center] [center]http://gyazo.com/a4db037e79c00734fc3c888979d67cf5[/center] [center]http://gyazo.com/ff26f3a72964a099fd998075ec460a89[/center] [center]http://gyazo.com/3607b217b51f63da67781604ec40b03d[/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Staff![/size][/font][/center] [center][font=verdana]Owner - Kyle[/font][/center] [center][font=verdana]Co - Owner - Mick[/font][/center] [center][font=verdana]Admin - OPEN[/font][/center] [center][font=verdana]Mod - G0ld[/font][/center] [center][font=verdana]Mod - OPEN[/font][/center]
[center][font=verdana]The More players the more spots that open! [/font][/center]
